00074 /*******************************************************************************
00075 **                      INCLUDE FILES                                         **
00076 *******************************************************************************/
00077 #include "../../inc/FATFS003/ffconf.h"
00078 #include <DAVE3.h>
00079 
00080 
00081 /*******************************************************************************
00082 **                      Global Variable Definitions                           **
00083 *******************************************************************************/
00084 
00085 #if _FS_REENTRANT
00086 
00089 FATFS003_MutexInfoType FATFS003_MutexInfo[FATFS003_MAX_LOGICAL_DRIVES];
00090 
00091 
00092 /* Mutex definations */
00093 osMutexDef(Drive0Mutex1);
00094 osMutexDef(Drive1Mutex2);
00095 osMutexDef(Drive2Mutex3);
00096 osMutexDef(Drive3Mutex4);
00097 
00098 osMutexDef(MutexToProtect);
00099 volatile osMutexId FATFS003_MutexProtectId;
00100 #endif
00101 
00102 /*******************************************************************************
00103 **                     Public Function Definitions                            **
00104 *******************************************************************************/
00105 /* This functions creates mutex for the file system. Since Fatfs doesn't supports 
00106  * extended partition feature, only 4 logical partitions can be created.
00107  */
00108 void FATFS003_Init()
00109 {
00110 #if _FS_REENTRANT
00111  /* Drive0 Mutex 1 */
00112   FATFS003_MutexInfo[0].MutexId = osMutexCreate (osMutex(Drive0Mutex1));
00113   if (/* !N_DBG*/(NULL ==  FATFS003_MutexInfo[0].MutexId ))
00114   {
00115     ERROR(GID_FATFS003, FATFS003_MUTEX_CREATE_FAILED, 0, 0);
00116   }
00117   
00118   FATFS003_MutexInfo[1].MutexId = osMutexCreate (osMutex(Drive1Mutex2));
00119   if (/* !N_DBG*/(NULL ==  FATFS003_MutexInfo[1].MutexId ))
00120   {
00121     ERROR(GID_FATFS003, FATFS003_MUTEX_CREATE_FAILED, 0, 0);
00122   }
00123   
00124   FATFS003_MutexInfo[2].MutexId = osMutexCreate (osMutex(Drive2Mutex3));
00125   if (/* !N_DBG*/(NULL == FATFS003_MutexInfo[2].MutexId ))
00126   {
00127     ERROR(GID_FATFS003, FATFS003_MUTEX_CREATE_FAILED, 0, 0);
00128   }
00129   FATFS003_MutexInfo[3].MutexId = osMutexCreate (osMutex(Drive3Mutex4));
00130   if (/* !N_DBG*/(NULL ==  FATFS003_MutexInfo[3].MutexId ))
00131   {
00132     ERROR(GID_FATFS003, FATFS003_MUTEX_CREATE_FAILED, 0, 0);
00133   }
00134   
00135   FATFS003_MutexProtectId = osMutexCreate (osMutex(MutexToProtect));
00136   if (/* !N_DBG*/(NULL ==  FATFS003_MutexProtectId ))
00137   {
00138     ERROR(GID_FATFS003, FATFS003_MUTEX_CREATE_FAILED, 0, 0);
00139   }
00140 #endif
00141 }
